body: The first time a spellcaster attempts to cast a spell within an antimagic field, there is a chance she will spontaneously gain a major spellblight. The caster must succeed at a Will saving throw (DC 15 + the caster level of the antimagic field or DC 23 if there is no caster level for the effect).
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Spellblights/Spellblights/Optional Ways to Acquire Spellblights/Antimagic Field
name: Antimagic Field
